rules_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life and may exile a card from a graveyard.
Blight {2}{WU}{WU} [i](You can cast this from your graveyard transformed for {2}{WU}{WU}. If you do, it enters under an opponent’s control. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
rules_text2: At the beginning of each end step, put a stun counter on two target tapped permanents you control. You lose 2 life.
notes:

brainwash 4 counter removed: gain 3 —> upkeep put +1/+1 and gain 2, sac if power 3
